title: Wasn't sure if passed wind in prayer but continued, prayer valid? Is it kufr #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: she today at ass prayer I felt Sensations like passing wind but there was no sound or smell I still went on with my prayer but I F I felt like committing kufur am I doing it right one question answer it with yes or no are you certain you passed wind uh I am not sure yeah I'm asking you answer with yes or no because I'm saying are you certain c e r t a i n are you certain you pass wind either you're certain or not certain yes or no no your prayer is valid move on
